attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We petition the Prime Minister to introduce legislation where Project Bank Accounts are compulsory throughiout the construction industry  on ALL projects and not just the public sector.The matter needs immediate attention not only to achieve substantial savings throughout the industry but to also ensure timely payment of all parties within the supply chain.

rejection.details: The title must include a call to action.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
